title: What is the meaning of the infinity symbol tattoo? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello there Mohammed. The infinity symbol, well, like the name suggests it means whatever you are getting that tattoo for, it will hold an eternal value to you. The infinity symbol is a never ending loop. So it means forever or always or limitless, never ending possibilities. It is one of the most positive tattoos there is.
The infinity tattoo is the shape of an eight lying down on its side. The shape has no beginning, no end to it, and it is a symbol for the eternal or infinity.
